mapper.insert: insert into ureply (urId, id, rPw, replytext, replyer, rGroup) values (reply.nextval, #{id}, #{rPw}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, reply.nextval)

insert into ureply (rGroup, urId, id, rPw, replytext, replyer, rStep, rIndent) values ((select rGroup from ureply where urId=#{urId}), reply.nextval, #{id}, #{rPw}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{rStep}, #{rIndent})
mapper.update: update ureply set rStep = rStep+1 where rGroup = #{rGroup} and rStep>#{rStep}
